Description: Clay tablet; complete; issue of "hushu" copper to make a "ruqqu" for Shamash; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.260)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
